sentences.en: All living cells can be classified as prokaryotic or eukaryotic.
sentences.cn: 所有活细胞可以被划分为原核和真核两类.

sentences.en: And possibly eukaryotic cells , those that we have, are possible within a decade.
sentences.cn: 而真核细胞, 则有可能在十年内实现.

sentences.en: Bacterial genes can transfer to eukaryotic host genomes.
sentences.cn: 细菌的基因可以转移到真核寄主基因组中.

sentences.en: CB could be expressed in high yield by vaccinia virus eukaryotic expression system.
sentences.cn: 痘苗病毒真核表达系统可以高效表达目的蛋白.

sentences.en: Eukaryotic gene regulation can alos occur at the level of translation.
sentences.cn: 真核基因调控也可以发生在翻译水平.

sentences.en: Eukaryotic genomes are composed of individual genes and their intergenic regions.
sentences.cn: 真核生物的基因组由基因和基因间区组成.

sentences.en: Histones are protein - found in eukaryotic cell nuclei, tightly bound to DNA, which has many phosphate groups.
sentences.cn: 组蛋白是存在于真核细胞核中的与含很多磷酸基团的DNA紧密结合的蛋白质.

sentences.en: Mitochondria are present in all eukaryotic cells.
sentences.cn: 一切真核的细胞都有线粒体.

sentences.en: Objective : To understand the characteristic of expression of HCV E 1 gene in eukaryotic cell.
sentences.cn: 目的: 了解丙型肝炎病毒(HCV) E1基因在真核细胞中的表达情况.

sentences.en: Objective To construct eukaryotic expression vector of siRNA specific for � � - site APP cleaving enzyme ( BACE ).
sentences.cn: 目的构建β淀粉样前体蛋白裂解酶 ( BACE ) 特异性小干扰RNA真核表达载体.

sentences.en: Plasmids are exta - chromosomal doublestranded, circular DNA molecules found in prokaryotic and eukaryotic cells.
sentences.cn: 质粒是在原核和真核细胞中发现的染色体外的双链环状DNA分子.

sentences.en: RESULTS: The eukaryotic expression vector containing the truncated human AIF ( AIF � � 1 - 400 ) gene was successfully constructed.
sentences.cn: 结果: 经酶切鉴定与测序证实,带有 AIF △ 1-400 的真核表达载体构建成功.

sentences.en: RESULTS: The eukaryotic expression vector pIRES 2 - EGFP containing the truncated human AIF ( AIF � � 1 - 480 ) gene was successfully constructed.
sentences.cn: 结果: 成功构建了人截短型AIF ( AIF△1480 ) 基因的真核表达载体.

sentences.en: That cell hybridization can be used to dissect regulatory mechanisms controlling gene expression in eukaryotic cells.
sentences.cn: 杂交细胞能被应用于剖析真核细胞中控制基因表现的调节机理.

sentences.en: These compartmentalised cells are called 'eukaryotic', and they all share a common ancestor that arose just once in four billion years of evolution.
sentences.cn: 这些划分的细胞被称为“真核生物”，它们源于一个共同的祖先，在四十亿年的进化出现只有一次。

sentences.en: These genes are needed for cell respiration, and without them eukaryotic cells die.
sentences.cn: 这些基因的细胞都需要呼吸，如果没有它们，真核细胞就会死亡。

sentences.en: This overturns the traditional view that the jump to complex 'eukaryotic' cells simply required the right kinds of mutations.
sentences.cn: 这颠覆了传统的观点，即实现复杂的'真核'细胞的跳跃发展仅仅要求正确种类的突变。

sentences.en: Ubiquitin - proteasome pathway is a highly effective protein - degradation pathway in the eukaryotic cells.
sentences.cn: 泛素 - 蛋白酶体途径是真核细胞内一种高效蛋白降解途径.
